SELECT A.CAUSE_AMOUNT, A.BUDG_BAL, A.ALLOT_PLAN_AMOUNT, A.BUDG_AMOUNT, A.ACC_YEAR, B.BIMOK_CD, B.BIMOK_NM
FROM (SELECT * FROM AB_RUN_BUDG WHERE ACC_YEAR =#{accYear}) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM AB_BUDG_BIMOK WHERE ACC_YEAR =#{accYear}) B ON A.BIMOK_CD = B.BIMOK_CD WHERE 1=1
AND B.BIMOK_CD = #{bimokCd}
ORDER BY B.BIMOK_CD
